articles.author: Timi Cantisano
articles.title: iPhone 15 Pro could get drastic change to ring/silent switch and volume buttons - XDA Developers
articles.description: We already knew about the solid-state volume buttons, but a new leak states that Apple could be ditching its ring/silent switch in favor of a button.
articles.content: The look and feel of the iPhone Pro model has largely remained unchanged for the past few years, which is both a good and bad thing, as it offers users familiarity, but doesn't really provide all tha… [+1720 chars]
